tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
** ****** ** *** **** ****** * **** **** **** **** *** ****** She is so very clear about her actions and I must say its always will be the best decision for you.

This was my second pregnancy and Dr. Dhwani suggested me the best at every stage. My first pregnancy experience was so smooth under her guidance and this time too it went pretty well.

I am so thankful to Dr Dhwani for this amazing motherhood journey, as she is so calm and patient while listening your concerns and resolving it.
I visited her for my infertility treatment and now I have 2 babies. All thanks to this angel (Dr Dhwani).

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Thank you so much of whole SCI hospital team from security guard to the doctors ,each and everyone who made our dream come true, gave me a beautiful daughter in my lap and let me feel the motherhood so smoothly.
1).security team:-thank you so much for you guys who really help in many ways even go over the board to make arrival and departure of guest so smooth each time (even though if you come for regular check-up).
2).reception team:- leading by a young lady name‚ÄùUsha‚Äù thank you so much for all the paper work you done for us on time and without making us wait and your prompt reply for either arranging appointments or billing is amazing.leading the team with an example .great supervisor.
Nurses:- all are professional from day shift to night shifts or sample collector nurses.I was there for three days and they were all prompt and keep checking with my health as well my daughter .
Doctors:-I am touched by the professionalism of all the junior or senior doctors,I am very sensitive person and the way they handle me and encourage me that I will gonna be a good mother ,thank you all so much.
Cleaners:-thank you each and everyone whom maintains the hygiene every time with a smile on their face.

My journey was there from August 2022 to Nov.2022 ,36 week of pregnancy ,Dr.Dhawani was my doctor and I must say what a young, amazingly experienced ,empathetic ,great doctor .I am all alone in my home only my husband and I have to take care of baby and it was our first child so we were so afraid and clueless to how raise the kid but honestly dr.Dhawani made our all journey so comfortable and not even physically she is always there to keep check on my mental health which mostly doctor ignore after and before pregnancy.she always there and made me aware each and every step of pre and post pregnancy symptom ,growth of my child and take care of my psyological chances .
SHE IS THE ONE WHO IS ACTUALLY PUSHING ME FOR NORMAL DELIVERY (So if anyone is telling you SCI HOSPITAL push for C-section they are wrong and misguiding you)all the facilities are morden and amazing,I got full trust that I am in a capable hands and she gave me the most beautiful gift of my life to cherish my motherhood.
Thank you so much dr.Dhawani and her team for every step and taking care of me and my health even after delivery.
Thank you so much dr.Neeraj (paediatrician) and his team who is still taking care of each and every milestone of my kid as well patienticaly answer my all queries.
Thank you so much Poonam(hospital representative and coordinator) for suggesting me SCI hopsital and always there for us in each step to made us feel like family.

Thank you so much everyone in this journey today my daughter is 3months old and the  way you guys teach me to raise this child is amazing.we are not facing the all issues which usually parents face like:-
1).from the first day of delivery I am eating healthy food and within second day I was out and enjoying my life (so, this is a myth to stay in a room for 6month ,yes we need rest and healthy diet but we need ourself too and I did not face any side effect or body pain)
2).my 3 month daughter is sleeping straight from9:00pm-7:00am (so there is no way tht kids made you sleepless at night)
3).she had colic but doctor teach me and gave proper attention so our this phase went so smooth .
4) child behavior is so important and dr. Neeraj advise work for it and my daughter from 2nd month sleeping in her own cot.

There are many so I am thankful to whole team to made my motherhood glowing and amazingly enjoyable.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
*** ****** ** *** **** ***** **** * ***** **** ***** **** She made my pregnancy journey smooth. She was always patient in listening to my concerns and helped with the best solution. 
The best thing about Dr. Dhwani is that she is always available for her patients. At times I have texted her on Sunday or even at odd hours and I always got revert from her. I trusted her with my pregnancy and I am super satisfied.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy,Pregnancy care and management,
review: I initially approached the selection of my gynaecologist with skepticism due to past unpleasant experiences. However, my journey took a positive turn when my husband and I met Dr. Dhwani Mago. Her exceptional kindness, responsiveness, and empathy, coupled with her ability to calm the patient made the entire experience from day 1 to delivery incredibly comfortable. Despite facing some challenges in the first trimester, Dr. Dhwani Mago's expert handling and guidance, marked by a judicious use of tests and scans, contributed significantly to my overall satisfaction. I am genuinely delighted with the support and treatment received and wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Dhwani Mago.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: Dr. Dhwani mam was very kind and patient. Mam's way of treatment was the best of all the doctors I have seen. All the doctors I have seen hesitate to even talk to us but Dhwani mam was very friendly and helping nature. She never hesitated to give consultation whenever I have doubt and need to see her. It is a wonderful journey with Dhwani mam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dilatation and Curettage for Endometrial Sampling,
review:
I was fed up with other doctors prescribing long list of tests. I looked up on Internet and searched for best gynaecologist in Delhi NCR and Dr. Dhwani was one among the top. I read all the reviews carefully and to my shock I couldn‚Äôt find a single negative review and now i know why. I hurriedly called and booked appointment on the same day. Doctor dhwani is an amazing doctor, she explains the situation nicely and patiently listens to problems. She elaborately explains positive and negative outcome of a disease.
I visited her for my mother‚Äôs post menopausal bleeding after visiting Apollo multiple times. she looked all the previous reports carefully and suggested us to go for biopsy. *** ****** ********* *** *********** ***** After biopsy, we were able to get the root cause of problem. My mom was diagnosed with endometrial cancer stage 1A and she along with oncologist surgeon did her radical hysterectomy.  Luckily we were able to identify it at early stage which is highly curable. 
She stays available even on whatsapp and treats every patient with empathy. Must visit her if you have any gynaecology related issue. She will point you in the right direction and will save you a lot of trouble.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
My Big Big Thanks to Dr Dwani Moga. I had took my wife there to visit Doc Dwani first time, and Honestly, we were very sacred of consulting a new doctor for a such a big problem my wife had.  we were not sure about how well this case will be taken care off. Because we had already met with some of the docs in past but they all were an average, in term of h√†ndling first time patient and explaining issues with them. But I must tell you that we were so happy to see the way she (Doc) has explained everything to us, handled and treated my wife's case. It was so caring and affectionate. Even after post surgery Doc Dwani is so kind and helpful that, on 1 call or message, she is available to look after and consult with us. The surgey took place under her guidance was so good and my patient was taken so well cared off. Now my wife has that faith and confidence in Doc Dwani, that she has decided to take treatment from Dr Dwani  only for anything and everything in future.  Once Again Thanks a ton to Doctor Dwani Moga. üôèüôÇ 

Sanjay Chaturvedi
H/O Shivani Chaturvedi ******************************************

context: Pregnancy Check Up,Hysteroscopy,Family Planning,Labor and Delivery,
review:
It was an absolute delight connecting with Dr. Dhwani Mago during my pregnancy, she is a great Gynecologist and a great human being above all. She made me comfortable from day 1 of my appointment, her patience, guidance and tolerance towards her patients is a remarkable quality in her. I remember troubling her even at odd hours with the smallest doubts to which she promptly responded, she never objected on asking my smallest doubts and always made me comfortable. In fact I was so comfortable with her that I wanted only her to deliver my baby as I could only rest my faith and confidence in her as my doctor. She never misguides her patients and is always very honest and upfront to her patients.

She is by far the best Gynecologist I have come across and I say that by experience !!!

Jaya Aggarwal

I am eternally grateful to this doctor for the exceptional care they provided, not just to me but to my precious baby as well. Thank you mam.
